string-array.name: ArrayOuestions
string-array.item: How To Request Letter of Recommindation ?

string-array.name: ArrayAnswers
string-array.item: You can create Account with your KSU email , You just need to add a Password and Personal information, before using Application.
If you are forgetten your password . click forget passwor in login page , There you will be able to fill out the forgotten password field with , your email address and an email will be sent to you!
You can Edit Your profile From Account , By click Edit profile
You can Request LOR By click on Request LOR and type email of issure , your comments purpose and upload your CV and Transcript.
